metadata.title: Advanced Visual Effects - Veo 3 Prompts
metadata.description: Advanced visual effects and post-production enhancement prompts for Veo 3

prompt_templates.name: Particle System Effects
prompt_templates.description: Dynamic particle-based effects like smoke, fire, sparks, and magical elements

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Realistic physics simulation, proper lighting interaction, dynamic behavior
prompt_structure.particle_types: Smoke, fire, sparks, dust, snow, rain, magical particles, debris

examples.prompt: Particle system: dramatic smoke particles, medium density level, upward swirling motion behavior, realistic interaction with environment lighting, realistic physics simulation, proper lighting interaction, dynamic behavior, industrial setting background

Particle system: magical sparkle particles, high density level, floating orbital motion behavior, luminous interaction with environment, realistic physics simulation, proper lighting interaction, dynamic behavior, fantasy scene setting

best_practices: Match particle behavior to environmental conditions
Use appropriate density for scene scale

prompt_templates.name: Dynamic Weather Effects
prompt_templates.description: Realistic weather phenomena including rain, snow, fog, and atmospheric effects

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Volumetric rendering, realistic precipitation, atmospheric perspective
prompt_structure.weather_types: Rain, snow, fog, mist, storm clouds, wind effects, lightning

examples.prompt: Weather effect: heavy rainfall, high intensity level, dramatic atmospheric impact, realistic surface interaction, volumetric rendering, realistic precipitation patterns, atmospheric perspective effects, urban nighttime setting
examples.expected_result: Cinematic rain effects with proper interaction

examples.prompt: Weather effect: gentle snowfall, medium intensity level, serene atmospheric impact, accumulation environmental interaction, volumetric rendering, realistic precipitation patterns, atmospheric perspective effects, winter landscape setting

best_practices: Use appropriate intensity for scene mood

prompt_templates.name: Holographic and Digital Effects
prompt_templates.description: Futuristic digital interfaces, holograms, and technological visual effects

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Proper transparency rendering, digital noise patterns, technological authenticity
prompt_structure.effect_types: Holograms, UI interfaces, data streams, digital glitches, scan lines

examples.prompt: Digital effect: floating holographic interface, semi-transparent opacity level, subtle scan line artifacts, gesture-based interaction method, proper transparency rendering, digital noise patterns, technological authenticity, futuristic office environment

Digital effect: data visualization streams, high transparency level, matrix-style digital artifacts, automated scrolling interaction method, proper transparency rendering, digital noise patterns, technological authenticity, cyberpunk setting

best_practices: Include subtle digital artifacts for authenticity
common_mistakes: Overly clean digital effects lacking authenticity

prompt_templates.name: Transformation and Morphing
prompt_templates.description: Object and character transformations, morphing effects, and metamorphosis

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Smooth transition curves, maintained visual continuity, realistic deformation
prompt_structure.transformation_types: Object morphing, character transformation, liquid transitions, geometric shifts

examples.prompt: Transformation effect: object morphing from cube to sphere, medium transition speed, fluid morphing technique, preserving surface texture elements, smooth transition curves, maintained visual continuity, realistic deformation physics

Transformation effect: liquid transition between scenes, fast transition speed, ripple morphing technique, preserving color elements, smooth transition curves, maintained visual continuity, realistic liquid physics

prompt_templates.name: Light Rays and Atmospheric Beams
prompt_templates.description: Volumetric light beams, god rays, and atmospheric lighting effects

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Volumetric rendering, realistic scattering, motivated light sources
prompt_structure.beam_types: God rays, laser beams, spotlight cones, window light shafts, stage lighting

examples.prompt: Light beam effect: cathedral god rays, medium intensity level, dust particle atmospheric interaction, stained glass window source motivation, volumetric rendering, realistic light scattering, motivated light sources, spiritual atmosphere
examples.expected_result: Dramatic cathedral lighting with god rays

examples.prompt: Light beam effect: concert spotlight cones, high intensity level, smoke atmospheric interaction, stage lighting source motivation, volumetric rendering, realistic light scattering, motivated light sources, performance venue
examples.expected_result: Dynamic stage lighting with volumetric beams

best_practices: Ensure light sources are properly motivated
Use atmospheric particles to reveal beams
common_mistakes: Unmotivated light beams without apparent source

rendering_quality.particle_systems: Need proper physics simulation and collision detection
rendering_quality.transparency: Require accurate alpha blending and compositing
rendering_quality.lighting_integration: Must interact realistically with scene lighting

performance_optimization.particle_count: Balance visual impact with rendering performance

narrative_enhancement.mood_setting: Use effects to establish emotional atmosphere
narrative_enhancement.time_passage: Employ effects to show temporal changes

combination_strategies.layered_effects: Combine multiple effects for complex visuals
combination_strategies.narrative_synchronization: Time effects with story beats and audio

quality_control.integration_review: Ensure seamless compositing with live elements
quality_control.performance_validation: Confirm smooth playback across target platforms

usage_notes.veo3_capabilities: Leverage Veo 3's native VFX generation capabilities
usage_notes.creative_balance: Use effects to enhance, not overwhelm story content
